name: 10 Second Pet
description: Congratulations on owning your very first Boogle! Boogle's have a life span of 10 seconds but that doesn't mean you can't pack as much love as you can into each second! Play with your Boogle! Feed your Boogle! Pet your Boogle! Snap your Boogle! Love your Boogle! Over 30 unique Boogles to own!
